text: wlqd ealimtum -ya maeshar alyhwd- ma hll min albas baslafkm min 'ahl alqaryat alati est allh, fima 'akhdhah ealayhim min tezym alsbt, fahtalu lastyad alsamak fi yawm alsbt, biwade alshshibak wahafr albirak, thuma astadu alsamak yawm al'ahad hilatan 'iilaa almhrm, falamaa faealuu dhlk, mskhhm allah qiradatan mnbwdhyn
